name: The Eternal Fire in the Flooded Factory
name_original: The Eternal Fire in the Flooded Factory
description:
You're an adventurer who's finally taking on the challenge of diving into the underwater factory where the eternal flame is.

Try to reach it and use the valves on each to drain the water.

This is my entry for HeartBeast's Heart Game Jam.

Project source: https://github.com/torresguilherme/heartgamejam
